text: Bernards High School is a four-year high school in Somerset County, New Jersey, United States. It serves grades 1-12 and kindergarten. It has students from Bernardsville, Far Hills and Peapack-Gladstone. Students from Bedminster are sent to the district's high school for grades 9-12.Somerset County School Districts-Sending/Receiving/Regional , Somerset County Superintendent of Schools. Accessed June 28, 2011. The school is in Bernardsville. In 2012-13 school year, the school had 785 students and 60.7 classroom teachers.School Data for Bernards High School, National Center for Education Statistics.
